title: 'Till All My People Are One

tokens.lyric: Help each other in all that you do

lines.raw: [C]Help each other in all that you do

tokens.lyric: Spread the peace, my brothers; spread it everywhere;

lines.raw: [Am]Spread the peace, my brothers; spread it everywhere;

tokens.lyric: Help the world know right from wrong; help the world to care.

lines.raw: [Em]Help the world know right from wrong; help the world to care.

tokens.lyric: Open your hearts, my brothers; lend a willing hand;

lines.raw: [C]Open your hearts, my brothers; lend a willing hand;

tokens.lyric: Show the lonely and the poor that God is in our land.

lines.raw: [F]Show the lonely and the poor that God is in our land.

tokens.lyric: Sing out the joy of living; sing your song on high;

lines.raw: [Am]Sing out the joy of living; sing your song on high;

tokens.lyric: The truth of mankind is that he's born to live, not die.

lines.raw: [Em]The truth of mankind is that he's born to live, not die.
